document_data.title: Shadowbred
document_data.author: [[Paul S. Kemp]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Shadowbred''''' is the first book in the [[The Twilight War]] trilogy by [[Paul S. Kemp]].  [[Erevis Cale]], struggling to preserve his humanity from a transformation into a [[shade]], struggles alongside [[Drasek Riven]] to find and free their friend, Mags, from [[Sakkors]].  In doing so, the group slows [[Netheril]]'s tightening grip on [[Sembia]].
{{quote|''[[Shar|The Lady]] has spoken to me.''

''It has already begun.''

''Shadows move out of the shrinking [[Anauroch|desert]], south to the rich and arrogant cities of [[Sembia]].''

''"Be brave, little man," says the shadowman, and the boy thinks his voice is surprisingly soft. "Stay with your mother. This will be over soon."''

''The shadows swallow him and he is gone.''

''On the edge of a war that will change the face of [[Faerûn]], the world will find that not all shadows serve [[Thultanthar|Shade Enclave]].''}}
